summary: An email from August 10, 2019, forwarding an update from the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) that Jeffrey Epstein was being taken by ambulance to the hospital following another apparent suicide attempt. The email notes that no other information was provided and that updates would follow.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email update; reported to have been taken by ambulance to the hospital from another apparent suicide attempt while in BOP custody.

events.title: Epstein Hospitalized After Apparent Suicide Attempt
events.description: The Bureau of Prisons (BOP) informed recipients that Jeffrey Epstein was being taken by ambulance to the hospital from another apparent suicide attempt, with no other details provided.

keyFacts: On August 10, 2019, the Bureau of Prisons reported Jeffrey Epstein was being taken to the hospital via ambulance following 'another apparent suicide attempt.'
The email characterizes this as 'another' attempt, indicating prior incidents of self-harm or suicide attempts while in custody.
The communication shows official notification of a critical incident involving Epstein just days before his death on August 10, 2019.
The email is a forward, indicating the information was being circulated among officials or legal team members.
